summary_text: Overall ROAS is healthy at 5.83, but several areas show potential for improvement through optimization of audiences, creatives and platform allocation.

insights.title: Retargeting Audience Showing Strong Performance
insights.description: The Retargeting audience segment significantly outperforms others with a ROAS of 14.40, suggesting efficient conversion of existing leads.

insights.title: Potential Creative Fatigue in High Impression Creatives
insights.description: Several creatives with high impressions are showing lower ROAS, indicating potential creative fatigue. Refreshing or replacing these creatives may improve performance.

creative_issues: Creatives with highest impressions showing ROAS between 7.83 and 20.65

insights.title: US Market Leads in ROAS
insights.description: The United States market exhibits the highest ROAS at 10.28, indicating a strong customer base and effective campaigns in this region. Consider increasing investment in this market.

insights.title: Underperforming Creatives Identified
insights.description: Several creatives show very low ROAS (below 3), representing an opportunity for optimization. These creatives should be paused or replaced to improve overall campaign efficiency.

creative_issues: Creatives with lowest ROAS all below 3

insights.title: Facebook Platform Slightly Outperforms Instagram
insights.description: The Facebook platform has a slightly higher ROAS (9.90) compared to Instagram (9.38). Explore reallocating budget to Facebook to capitalize on higher returns.

insights.title: ROAS Fluctuation Throughout January-March
insights.description: Daily ROAS shows considerable fluctuation between 6.36 and 18.60 throughout the period of January to March, signalling external factor influence or a need for more stable campaign settings.

insights.title: High Performing Creatives Identified
insights.description: Certain creatives, especially those related to 'Doctors recommend breathable modal â€” meet our men boxers' shows ROAS above 50.9, which represents a good opportunity to scale those creatives.
